com.samsung.android.sdk.mediacontrol

Interface SmcProvider.EventListener

  • Enclosing interface:
    SmcProvider

    public static interface SmcProvider.EventListener
    This listener interface provides callback methods for SmcProvider content provider events.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onContentUpdated(SmcProvider smcProvider, int error)
      Called when content is updated.
      void onUploadCompleted(SmcProvider smcProvider, SmcItem smcItem)
      Called when the content has been uploaded to the content provider.
      void onUploadProgressUpdated(SmcProvider smcProvider, long receivedSize, long totalSize, SmcItem smcItem, int error)
      Called when the content upload progress information is updated.

    • Method Detail

      • onContentUpdated

        void onContentUpdated(SmcProvider smcProvider,
                    int error)
        Called when content is updated.
        Parameters:
        smcProvider - The content provider instance
        error - The event status description. The valid values are:
        • Smc.ERROR_NETWORK_NOT_AVAILABLE
        • Smc.ERROR_PERMISSION_NOT_ALLOWED
        • Smc.ERROR_SERVICE_NOT_CONNECTED
        • Smc.ERROR_CONTENT_NOT_AVAILABLE
        • Smc.SUCCESS

      • onUploadProgressUpdated

        void onUploadProgressUpdated(SmcProvider smcProvider,
                           long receivedSize,
                           long totalSize,
                           SmcItem smcItem,
                           int error)
        Called when the content upload progress information is updated.
        Parameters:
        smcProvider - The content provider instance.
        receivedSize - The amount of content received.
        totalSize - The total size of the content being uploaded to the content provider.
        smcItem - The content being uploaded to the content provider.
        error - The event status description. The valid values are:
        • Smc.ERROR_NETWORK_NOT_AVAILABLE
        • Smc.ERROR_PERMISSION_NOT_ALLOWED
        • Smc.ERROR_SERVICE_NOT_CONNECTED
        • Smc.ERROR_CONTENT_NOT_AVAILABLE
        • Smc.SUCCESS

      • onUploadCompleted

        void onUploadCompleted(SmcProvider smcProvider,
                     SmcItem smcItem)
        Called when the content has been uploaded to the content provider.
        Parameters:
        smcProvider - The content provider instance.
        smcItem - The content that has been uploaded.
